prefixIntro.title: T 开头核心词
prefixIntro.description: 高中阶段 T 开头的高频混合词汇。
prefixIntro.imagery: 字母 T 像一棵树（Tree）或支撑物，常含“接触（Touch）、延伸、支撑”之意。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M4 4 h16 v12 h-8 l-4 4 v-4 h-4 z' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.5'/><rect x='6' y='6' width='12' height='8' rx='1' stroke='currentColor' fill='none' stroke-width='2'/><path d='M8 9 h8 M8 12 h5' stroke='currentColor'/>
words.imagery: 将口头的话语（对话气泡）转录到一张便签纸上，以便传递。

sentences.en: I am afraid he's not here today. Can I take a message?
sentences.cn: 恐怕他今天不在这里。我能帮您捎个口信吗？

words.imagery: 两个脚印一前一后，交替前行，代表悠闲的散步。

sentences.en: People like taking a walk after dinner.
sentences.cn: 人们喜欢晚饭后散步。

sentences.en: Let's have a takeaway tonight.
sentences.cn: 我们今晚吃外卖吧。

sentences.en: Your brother is a man of many talents.
sentences.cn: 你哥哥是个多才多艺的人。

sentences.en: He's so talented!
sentences.cn: 他太有才了！

sentences.en: I'm glad that you have finished the task.
sentences.cn: 我很高兴你完成了任务。

sentences.en: The strawberries taste good.
sentences.cn: 这些草莓尝起来味道很好。

sentences.en: If I were his teammate, I wouldn't do that.
sentences.cn: 如果我是他的队友，我不会那么做。

words.imagery: 一个戴着棒球帽、背着双肩包、充满活力的年轻人形象。

sentences.en: She was in her teens when she met him.
sentences.cn: 当她遇见他时，她才十几岁。

sentences.en: She was in her teens when she met him.

sentences.en: I used to play tennis with my friend when I was young.
sentences.cn: 我年轻时常和朋友打网球。

sentences.en: This tent can hold 4 people.

sentences.en: Text me when you get home.
sentences.cn: 你到家了就给我发个信息。

sentences.en: Pass me your English textbook.
sentences.cn: 把你的英语课本递给我。

sentences.en: How far should I throw this ball?

sentences.en: Check the train timetable.

sentences.en: I am very tired after a day of work.
sentences.cn: 工作一天后我非常累。

sentences.en: Studying for 4 hours is very tiring.
sentences.cn: 连续学习4个小时非常累人。

sentences.en: Many people ask me why my teeth are so white.
sentences.cn: 很多人问我为什么我的牙齿这么白。

sentences.en: Change your toothbrush every three months.
sentences.cn: 每三个月换一次牙刷。

sentences.en: We are running out of toothpaste.
sentences.cn: 我们的牙膏快用完了。

sentences.en: The story is touching.
sentences.cn: 这个故事很感人。

sentences.en: We tour by car every summer.
sentences.cn: 我们每年夏天都开车旅行。

sentences.en: Are you a tourist?
sentences.cn: 你是游客吗？

sentences.en: The Tower of London stands in the east end of London.
sentences.cn: 伦敦塔位于伦敦的东区。

sentences.en: Let's make a trade.
sentences.cn: 我们做个交易吧。

sentences.en: She's training to be a doctor.
sentences.cn: 她正在接受成为医生的培训。

sentences.en: Blood and treasure are the costs of war.
sentences.cn: 鲜血和财富是战争的代价。

words.rootVisual: <path d='M20 6 L9 17 l-5 -5' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='3' fill='none' stroke-linecap='round' stroke-linejoin='round'/><path d='M4 6 l16 12 M4 18 l16 -12' stroke='currentColor' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.2'/>
words.imagery: 一个巨大而清晰的对勾代表“真”，背景中用虚线画出一个“X”代表“假”作为对比。

sentences.en: Is it true that you're moving?
sentences.cn: 你要搬家是真的吗？

sentences.en: My answer is true and yours is false.
sentences.cn: 我的答案是真的，而你的是假的。

words.imagery: 两只手紧紧握在一起，或者一个人向后倒，相信后面有人会接住。

sentences.en: I trust him completely.
sentences.cn: 我完全信任他。
